title: Crusty
body:
<< name crusty >> 
Hey you!
Yeah the small lookin' purple one.
You got any motor oil by chance? I'm really cravin' some ya see? I haven't had any in days!
Could you spare any?

<< name littleOne>>
[[ No, I can't.|Nomot]] 
[[ I would if I had any. Sadly I don't. |sadnomot]]

title: Nomot
body:
<< name crusty >>
Yeah sure you can't...

<< name littleOne >>
Look, I promise I don't have any.
[[look]]

title: sadnomot
body:
<< name crusty >> 
Yeah, I'm sure. I bet you used it all your self!

<< name littleOne >>
Look, I promise I don't have any.
[[look]]

title: look
body:
<< name crusty >>
You jerk! You're totally hoggin' all the motor oil to yourself!
This is what I hate about this place. Everyone is the same... and you're no different. 
No one down here has any damn empathy in their cold, wire brains. Even if I were the last damn bot on earth, you wouldn't spare anything for me. 

<< name littleOne >> 
But...

<< name crusty>> 
I don't wanna hear it! Now get out of here! I don't want to see that selfish purple face of yours anymore.
